19d107e0-3514-4265-97a1-ec7957c60680.name: Burned Blue Lobster
19d107e0-3514-4265-97a1-ec7957c60680.description: Its striking hue tragically concealed by overcooking.

f873bdfd-ce2e-4671-ba4a-89a151aa261d.name: Burned Kraken
f873bdfd-ce2e-4671-ba4a-89a151aa261d.description: Such a legendary creature deserved a better culinary fate.

50e799e4-2609-4984-ba68-9b4f70ee2027.name: Burned Octopus

1e566a7b-62ed-4c91-b0b6-185d4ce554b7.description: Its delicate flavors now overshadowed by the bitterness of overcooking.

9709713d-f176-4d44-b0f8-0c2f26ccb447.description: Thick steaks grilled to seal in the moisture.

1de3fa80-13ae-4922-99bd-669e9bc83938.description: A magical tome that allows the user to teleport to a chosen island.
